'''''Amon Hen'' 148''' is the one-hundred-and-forty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in November [[1997]].

==Contents==
* Cover: Untitled
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Editorial
** By: Andrew McMurry
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Options for Society Subscriptions
** By: Mike Percival
* Announcements
* Obituary: Lester Simons
** By: [[John Ellison]]
* Memories of Lester Simons
** By: various contributors
* Review: Alan Lee Illustrated Hobbit
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Review: Italian TS 1998 Calendar
** By: Trevor Reynolds
* Review: ''Hobbit'' CD by Kim Skovbye
** By: Richard Crawshaw & [[Chris Crawshaw]]
* [[Oxonmoot]] Reports
** By: [[Marcel Bülles]]
** By: Steve Charnock
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* Letters Pages
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Hildifons's Half of Amon Hen
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* Tolk Folk
* New Members/Committee
